mean_cn: adj.（神经）紧张的；  v.使拉紧；拉紧；  n.时态
mean_en: (of a person) nervous or worried, and unable to relax; (of a situation, an event, a period of time, etc.) in which people have strong feelings such as worry, anger, etc. that often cannot be expressed openly
sentence: I feel really tense about the coming exam.
sentence_trans: 我真的很紧张即将来临的考试。
word_etyma: tense=tens伸展 → 绷紧的，紧张的
